name: Game Dev Diary
description:
Game Dev Diary is a very short and simple escape game. I developed it within 2 days for the LEGO IDEAS Game Jam.

Originally I was working on another game which I might publish here later, but problems during development inspired me to create this little game instead.

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys for movement
Space for jump/double jump
Mouse for free look camera
IJKL for moving the chair (you don't really need this, I just added this for fun)
